title: `winit-0.29.0-beta.0` breaks support for `neo` keyboard layout
body:
With commit db90350 the bump of `winit` to their current beta release breaks support for some arrow keys on layer 3 in the `neo` keyboard layout family.
This seems to be related to a renaming of the key events from e.g. `Up` to `ArrowUp` (other directions respectively). I am at this point not sure, why the native arrow keys still work but this will be part to be figured out for my upstream bugreport I am going to file.

This issue is intended to give reference and to track fix of the upstream issue.

### System

OS: Linux
Version: `alacritty 0.13.0-dev (db90350)
Linux/BSD: X11, leftwm and dwm tested, should not matter though

### Logs

Output of `xkbcli` to show that for x11 the events look basically the same (note: `VOU` is a [custom variant](https://www.maximilian-schillinger.de/vou-layout.html) of the [neo layout](https://www.neo-layout.org/)):
```
alacritty >>> xkbcli interactive-x11                                                                                                                                                                                              â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Up               ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (T3) (0) ] level [ 0 ] mods [ ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Left             ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (T3) (0) ] level [ 0 ] mods [ ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Down             ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (T3) (0) ] level [ 0 ] mods [ ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Right            ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (T3) (0) ] level [ 0 ] mods [ ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                        â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ ISO_Level5_Shif  ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (VOU) (1) ] level [ 0 ] mods [ ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                       â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Up               ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (VOU) (1) ] level [ 4 ] mods [ -Mod3 ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Left             ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (VOU) (1) ] level [ 4 ] mods [ -Mod3 ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Down             ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (VOU) (1) ] level [ 4 ] mods [ -Mod3 ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Right            ] unicode [  ] layout [ German (VOU) (1) ] level [ 4 ] mods [ -Mod3 ] leds [ Group 2 ]                                                                                                                 â”‚
â”‚keysyms [ Escape           ] unicode [  layout [ German (T3) (0) ] level [ 0 ] mods [ ] leds [ Group 2 ]
```
<details>
<summary>Actual alacritty logs:</summary>

